channel.title: Environmental variables
channel.description:
i got a new computer and im setting my environmental variables but i can't find the PATH and something else i know to set 2 but wich ones
can anyone tell me wich ones i got to set
and dont bother telling me to search because i did and there are none shown...

item.title: Environmental variables
item.dc:creator: @wicked_destiny wicked destiny
item.description:
@wicked_destiny wrote:

ty thats what i needed to know[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2008, 12:59:58 PM[/size][hr]anyone knows the PATH?

item.title: Environmental variables
item.dc:creator: @MasterBacus MasterBacus
item.description:
@MasterBacus wrote:

ok do you have jdk 6 update4?
if so put this for classpath
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_4\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
and path is
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_4\bin

Read full topic
